# art

**Instance Property**

An image to that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.

## Declaration

```swift
var art: CGImage { get }
```

## Discussion

The image requirements are:

- Square corners.
- Doesn’t include an account number.
- Doesn’t include the user name.

## Information for displaying an addable card

- **title**: A name for the pass that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.
- **identifier**: A developer-defined value you use to identify the card.
